Patterson, Pat and Fatima Shaik -- Editor-at-Large at Black Enterprise Magazine, Staff Member of the Institute of Afro-American Affairs at NYU and Coordinator for the AEJ Summer Journalism Program
Patterson, Pat and Fatima Shaik -- Editor-at-Large at Black Enterprise Magazine, Staff Member of the Institute of Afro-American Affairs at NYU and Coordinator for the AEJ Summer Journalism Program
Dr. Roscoe C. Brown, Jr., Pat Patterson, and Fatima Shaik discuss opportunities, like the AEJ Summer Journalism Porgram, that allow minority students to explore the field of journalism.
